sentences.en: Hermione's Patronus turns out to be an otter.
sentences.cn: 赫敏的守护神是一只水獭.

sentences.en: Monterey Bay Aquarium also works to save the sea otter.
sentences.cn: 蒙特里海湾水族馆也致力于挽救海獭.

sentences.en: My jacket is made of otter skins.
sentences.cn: 我的皮夹克是用水獭皮做的.

sentences.en: Not an Otter to be seen, as far as the distant horizon.
sentences.cn: 从脚下一直望到天边,一只水獭也不见.

sentences.en: Otter is a fur - covered, fish - eating aquatic animal.
sentences.cn: 水獭是全身长毛 、 以鱼为食的水生动物.

sentences.en: She collared my black wool coat with otter pelts.
sentences.cn: 她把我的黑呢上衣镶上了水獭领.

sentences.en: Since 1977 otter hunting has been illegal.
sentences.cn: 捕猎水獭1977年以后就被列为非法了。

sentences.en: The economists say the competition otter to the brink of extinction.
sentences.cn: 经济学家们说,竞争把海獭推到了灭绝的边缘.

sentences.en: The heron annf the otter are my friend.
sentences.cn: 苍鹭和水獭是我的好友.

sentences.en: The otter , as knowing all the paths, took charge of the party.
sentences.cn: 水獭熟悉路径, 担任了向导.

sentences.en: The Otter live in large hollow logs.
sentences.cn: 水獭生活在空心树干内.

sentences.en: The Rat and the Otter looked at each other and laughed.
sentences.cn: 水鼠和水獭相互看著对方然后大笑.

sentences.en: The sea otter is gentle and relatively tame ( Peter Matthiessen )
sentences.cn: 海獭性情温和并且相对来说不怕人( 彼得马蒂恩森 )

sentences.en: Today, the otter is extinct in Belgium, Holland and Switzerland.
sentences.cn: 现在, 在比利时, 荷兰和瑞士的水獭已经灭绝了.

sentences.en: Von Otter was superb both in the darkly dramatic songs, and in the lighter ones.
sentences.cn: 冯·奥特无论是演唱严肃的戏剧曲目还是较为轻松愉快的歌曲时，都表现得无可挑剔。

trans.tran_en: an animal with smooth brown fur that swims in rivers and eats fish
